prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: John C. Graham Letter to Jane Bane, Accession #10727, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This letter was given to the Library by Mrs. W. W. Coxe of Lynchburg, Virginia, on August 19, 1987.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This material consists of a single letter, September 21, 1837, from John C. Graham to Miss Jane Bane, of Giles County, Virginia, in which he proposes marriage in a very formal manner.
